description: reclining man wearing cap in foreground, leaning on a fallen column (?); young man in URC; woman wearing a headscarf holding a sleeping child at center; dog at left
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscription

LLC below image on mount, in pencil: [R. D. I, ing. 31. Suite de deux eft ptg (?)]
provenance: [James A. Bergquist, Newton Centre, Mass., until 2006; sold in August for PTOO with Bourdon's L'Enfant qui boit, to Harry Drake]; Harry Drake, St. Paul (2006-d. 2012; bequeathed to MIA)
signed: ULC, in the print: [Seb. Bourdon jnuenit et fecit / L. Boisseuin ex. cum prnit. (?) Regis]; bottom center of mount, in pencil: [336. les pauvres au repos]
title: Les Pauvres au repos
